3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。
4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of     biomedical system。
5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 
6. Medical measurement theory and technology。
7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。
8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。
9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。
10.Designs of b

description.zh:
本課程主要在研討傳統的結構化語言的編譯技術。課程所所涵蓋的內容包括有：

- 語句上的分析、語句分析器的製作
- 由上而下的組譯器製作
- 由下而上的組譯器製作
- 語意分析
- 機器碼之產生與暫存器之配置
- 資料流分析的理論與應用
- 程式碼最佳化處理

課程的實施，將以基本編譯技術為主，作深入的介紹。學習所得的觀念與技術，將利用一個實驗性語言編譯器的實作來貫穿。因此，程式規畫實作，將在這個課程中，佔有相當大的比重。

notes: 四子三甲乙四甲乙合開

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1.半導體元件簡介 2.物理氣相沉積 3.化學氣相沉積 4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

name.zh: 精巧型電源轉換積體電路設計
name.en: Smart Power Conversion Integrated Circuit Design

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計精巧型電源轉換積體電路,進而能培養學生具有設計精巧型電源轉換積體電路的能力,課程內容包念： 1. 介紹 2. 被動元件 3. 功率開關 4. 直流-直流電源轉換 5. 偏壓電路 6. 運算放大器 7. 參考電路 8. 邏輯控制電路 9. 電流感測電路 10. 保護電路 11. 頻率補償 12. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of smart power conversion integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of smart power conversion integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2. Passive components 3. Power switches 4. DC-DC power conversion 5. Bias circuits 6. Operational amplifiers 7. Reference circuits 8. Logic control circuits 9. Current sensing circuits 10. Protection circuits 11. Frequency compensation 12. Case study

name.zh: 積體電路佈局設計實務
name.en: Integrated Circuit Layout Design and Implementation

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟體來設計積體電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積體電路佈局的能力,課程內容包含：1.佈局與電路的差異2.CMOS佈局的介紹3.電阻、電容的佈局介紹4.類比電路單元的佈局5.類比電路佈局的規劃6.輸入/輸出焊墊的介紹7.電感的佈局8.射頻電路的佈局9.電流鏡的佈局10.鎖相迴路的佈局11.雙級運算放大器的佈局12.交換電容分器的佈局13.低雜訊放大器的佈局14.數位類比轉換的佈局15.類比數位轉換器的佈局
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of integrated circuit layout. Therefore, the student has the design capability of integratd circuit layout. The contedts of this course:1.Differences between layout and circuit 2.CMOS layout style 3.R、C layout.4.Analog cell layout 5.Analog floor plan 6.I/O pad layout issue 7.L Layout 8.RF circuit layout 9.Current mirror layout 10.PLL layout 11.Two stage OPA layout 12.Switched capacitor integrator layout 13.LNA layout 14.D/A layout 15.A/D layout

description.zh: 此課程之目標為多媒體系統整介紹，包含介紹所有影像和視訊的標準格式、視訊的壓縮基本原理，目前主流的視訊壓所標準格式，讓學生了解到1.多媒體簡介2.多媒體發展平台3.多媒體資訊系統設計4.多媒體資訊系統實體建置。課程內容包含: 1.多媒體資料簡介2.多媒體發展平台3.多媒體資料處理4.多媒體壓縮技術5.多媒體標準架構6.多媒體系統設計7.多媒體實體建置
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the Multimedia Systems, including: (1) Introduction to Multimedia Systems (2)Multimedia Platforms for developers (3)Digital Signal Processing for Multimedia Systems (4) Data and Image Compression for Multimedia Systems (5) Multimedia Frameworks (6) Design of Multimedia Systems (7) Develop and Manage Multimedia Systems

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: n
description.en: n

notes: 同步遠距(限20人)，臺北大學林秋綿老師，博雅選修自然

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1.半導體元件簡介 2.物理氣相沉積 3.化學氣相沉積 4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 實際演練室內設計工程中由生活需求分析及調查,規劃設立,施工,協調,管理等各種活動.並綜合性掌握環境中各種條件以習得室內設計的手法.
description.en: The Course is divided into five units: 1). The Nineteenth Century: The Industrial Revolution was the major influence on architectural history development. Structures of this period were marvels of engineering using materials like iron, plate glass, and reinforced concrete in new types of construction. 2). Foundation of Modernism (1890-1920) : In this period, the art community, including Cubism, Expressionism, De Stijl, Futurism and Constructivism, greatly influenced the form of building. 3).Modernism(1920-1970) : In this period, emphasises were placed on the "Less is More" , historicism and ornament were abandoned, the replacement were form and function, reason and abstraction. 4).Postmodernism (1965-1989) : Postmodernism architecture is characterized by the idea of "Less is Boring", and was inspired by Classical tradition and historical precedents. 5).Contemporary Pluralism : In the latter part of the twentieth century, an architect doesn't want to be associated with a movement, unle

notes: 家室組(四創意三和四設三合開)

description.zh: 本課程內容主要希望讓學生認識「核輻射」及其安全與防護。修習內容將包括：輻射與物質作用、輻射度量與劑量、輻射防護與安全、輻射防護法規、核能安全之設計、放射性廢棄物處置、輻射的化學效應和生物效應、基本醫學影像技術-- X射線攝影、核磁共振、正子掃瞄。
description.en: The goal of this lecture hopes to offer students the knowledge in "Nuclear Radiation". It mainly includes: Interaction between matter and radiation; Radiation measurement and dosimetry; Radiation protection and safety; Regulation of radiation protection; Design in Nuclear safety; Radioactive waste management; Chemical and Biological effects by radiation; Basic introduction to medical imaging: CT, NMR, PET.

name.zh: 創業講座-網路創新與創業
name.en: Model of Entrepreneurs –Internet Innovation and Entrepreneurship

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的發展，電子商務的產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，面對這波網路創業風潮，應如何在茫茫網海中嶄露頭角？網路上沒有絕對正確的答案，最好的學習方式就是彼此分享成功經驗。這次講座特別邀請國內知名的網路創業達人，分享他們的創業故事。走吧，跟著這次講座來趟冒險吧！
description.en:
Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. How do you create a successful internet business endeavor?
There is no specific success formula; the best way is to learn from the experts in this field. This course will invite well-known internet entrepreneurs to share their success stories with the students and allow students to gain insights to various internet business models.

notes: (上ABC三節課)四管二與經管所、最後一哩合開，限300

name.zh: 國際觀培養-布局全球‧放眼國際

description.zh: 本課程藉由企業與莘莘學子們的交流，分享企業品牌的經營、整合行銷、外銷推廣等經驗之機會，並佐以企業品牌之實際案例，讓同學們更能了解品牌行銷非一蹴可及，惟有落實長期經營才能獲得此成效。亦培養同學獨立思考之能力，減少自行摸索的時間，輕鬆掌握品牌觀念與實務，成為炙手可熱的品牌行銷人才。
description.en: The course aims to develop the knowledge and skills needed to prepare the managers to create an enduring advantage for their brand. Through sharing the experiences and case study on brand management, integrated marketing communication, and export promotion by enterprises, students can benefit to apply the knowledge and concepts in practical brand management. They can inspired independent and creative thinking on brand marketing from the course; moreover, they can trained for branding marketing talents in global arena.

notes: (上ABC三節課)四管二與經管所、最後一哩合開，限300

description.zh: 使學生建立邏輯量化思考，並了解管理科學解決問題之方法及應用，且有能力利用電腦工具協助分析經營管理問題，達成最佳化決策。
description.en: To build the quantitative logic thinking about the decision problems. The course is designed to introduce the fundamental techniques and methods of operations research. The related software will be utilized to aid in building and solving models. The topics to be covered: linear programming, what-if analysis, dual theory, transportation and assignment.

description.zh: 本實習著重在材料的合成法，包含人工晶體及各式無機材料的合成實作。實驗設計皆搭配「材料合成」授課內容，所得之樣品將進一步做表面與結構上的分析。核心實驗計有： (1)固態反應法合成鈦酸鋇粉末 (2)化學氣相沈積法沈積薄膜材料 (3)沉澱法合成磁性氧化鐵粉末 (4)溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽粉末 (5) 溶膠─凝膠法合成二氧化矽薄膜 (6)氧化還原法合成金奈米顆粒 (7) 磷酸二氫銨晶體成長 (8) 物理氣相沈積法沈積金薄膜材料
description.en: The laboratory sections in this course are designed to synthesize various inorganic materials. Eight experiments will be carried out in a semester including: 1. Synthesis of BaTiO3 powders by solid-state reaction 2. Preparation of thin film by chemical vapor deposition 3. Synthesis of magnetic Fe3O4 powders by precipitation reaction 4. Synthesis of SiO2 powders by sol-gel reaction 5. Synthesis of SiO2 thin film by sol-gel reaction 6. Synthesis of Au nanoparticles by oxidation-reduction reaction 7. Crystal growth of NH4H2PO4 8. Preparation of gold thin film by physical vapor deposition.

description.zh: 介紹空中攝影測量以及遙測的概念、原理，製作DTM與判釋影像的技術，訓練學生應用遙測資訊的初步技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts regarding the aerial photogrammetry and remote sensing. The production of DTM and interpretation of aerial photos and satellite images are included.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002011或負責教授同意。特徵值、特徵向量及特徵函數，向量分析、向量微積分、傅立葉級數與邊界值問題、偏微分方程、複變函數。
description.en: Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.

name.zh: 低碳環境規劃與設計實務
name.en: The practice of Low carbon environment planning & design

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前生態環境議題與強化並整合有關低碳環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of eco- environmental issues, and further integrate our knowledge about low carbon theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice.

notes: (上ABC三節，六週)四建三與最後一哩合開，限150人

description.zh: 建立設計專業用德文基礎；德文發音、拼音、基本句型、詞類文法及設計專業德文導讀，用以唸讀及理解設計專業相關德文。
description.en: Introducing the alphabet pronunciation, phonation, sentence structures and the ten parts speech grammar of German to building the capability of reading and understanding the design based German.

description.zh:
1.電路元件
2.電路特性
3.網路方程式
4.穩態分析及頻率響應
5.網路函數：極點及零點
6.雙埠網路分析
7.傅利葉及拉普拉斯轉換
description.en:
1.Circuit components
2.Circuit characteristics
3.Network equations
4.Steady state analysis and frequency response
5.Network Functions: poles and zeros
6.Two-port network analysis
7.Fourier and laplace transform

description.zh: 以CAD繪圖軟體為教學範本，熟悉及應用繪圖指令，繪製機械之二度、三度空間的機械圖形，並能充分應用電腦的功能，以達輔助機械製圖及電腦輔助設計為目標。
description.en:
Prerequisite: ME151 or Consent of Instructor
Use commercial CAD softwares (e.g.: Turbo CAD or Auto CAD) as the tutorial examples for Mechanical Drawings, including 2-D and 3-D drawings, to edit and to modify the Menu, Script and Block etc..

description.zh: 本課程係提供全校學生與創意理論與實務界交流的平台，提供學生建立創意發展的理論與實務經驗，協助學生進行創意開展之操作，透過邀請國內著名之設計與發明界相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，及舉辦創意工作營(workshop)與分組討論教學，經由專家學者之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生創意進行相關產品之研發，開發學生創意之潛能。
description.en: This class provides a platform for students to communicate with creative scholars and industry specialists in order to gain more experience of developing creativity and practice. Aiming to stimulate students' creative thinking and product developing ability, this class holds creative workshops &, group discussions, and invites famous experts of industry, official and academic territories to give speeches.

notes: 四設三及四.創新所.最後一哩(限非設計學院20人）合開

description.zh: 本課程透過分析及審視地道新聞教材如電視、網站、報紙、廣播的時事、深度報導和全球議題，加強學生英語字彙能力、聽力及寫作技巧。
description.en: Description The course is designed to enhance students’ overall ability in news vocabularies, listening and writing skills through analyzing and examining authentic news materials, such as up-to-date news stories, in-depth reports and global issues from TV, websites, newspaper and radio.

notes: 共同選修,不列入畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程透過研讀文學經典著作學習英文。研讀名著既可領略文學經典蘊含的智慧、對生命的洞見，又可藉細讀作品的遣詞造句和謀篇佈局吸取英文精華，培養對文字的敏感和創意。
description.en: This course aims to approach English through literature. Reading classics inspires insights into life and challenges accepted values. By close reading of different genres, sentence structures, and vocabularies used in the texts, students' sensitivity to the language can be developed and an idiomatic English can be acquired.

notes: 共同選修,不列入畢業學分

name.zh: 就業達人講座-人資需求大搜密

description.zh: 本課程透過知名企業主管及各大領域專家與同學交流，透過他們職場多年經驗與同學分享時間管理與壓力管力、職場生存技巧，強化學生的職場力與人生定位的觀念，最後並安排企業參訪協助學生提早瞭解自我性向,發覺潛能,做好生涯規劃，開設「就業講座(二)-企業家的用人哲學」之課程，藉由企業參訪與業界實際案例，提前為進入做好身心靈的準備。
description.en: The course mainly invites managers and experts of well-known enterprises to share working experience and professional knowledge. After the classes with experts and industrial managers, the course includes an industrial visit to help students to gain more ideas about career. The course is eventually expected to have the result of emphasizing student's capabilities in terms of future work and life planning. Hope the course can provide a direction and some knowledge to students and they can be more prepared to work.

notes: 上ABC三節四化四甲乙、化工所與最後一哩合開(限180人)

description.zh: 本課程分為Dreamweaver網頁設計、PHP與MySQL基礎，以及互動網頁設計等三部份。包括Dreamweaver的網頁圖文編輯、表格製作、超連結、分割框架、佈景主題應用、動態網頁、表單設計、網站的發佈與管理，以及PHP與MySQL環境設定、MySQL資料庫管理、SQL基本語法、PHP程式設計入門、用PHP存取MySQL等；讓同學有能力設計一個商業網站。
description.en:
The course is for the designation of commercial web site. The is course composed of 3 parts:（1）Dreamweaver（2）PHP（3）MySQL data base.
Learning how to build up the commercial website.

notes: 計網電腦教室313，陳書儀老師

name.zh: 國際觀培養-國際商務禮儀及溝通
name.en: Global Perspective - International Business Etiquette and Communication Skill

description.zh: 本課程講授以國際交流中社交及商務場域為主軸，深入分析國際人士於跨文化溝通中需具備之策略與技巧。
description.en: This course center its emphasis on international communication in various social and business contexts, strategies and skills will be introduced to enhance students' international communicative competence.

notes: (上ABC三節課，六週)四英二最後一哩合開限180人

description.zh:
本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
1. 94學年度起之大學部入學新生擬修習「英文實務」課程說明：學生修習「英文實務」課程，必須參加全民英檢中級初試， 其中「聽力 測驗」及「閱讀測驗」兩項成績合計達80分以上，始得修習此課程，修課學生請持「全民英檢中級初試成績單正本及影本至」教務處註冊組登錄。）
2. 為考量同學因個人生涯規劃，若參加「全民英檢」以外的英語檢定考試，例如適用於全球職場英文能力統一標準之TOEIC測驗及教育部所規定採計之其他英檢考試等。其考試成績如對應符合CEF B1級（全民英檢中級）以上者，免修英文實務。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 大三下特教生(限領有聽障手冊)視教201

name.zh: 智慧電子應用設計概論
name.en: Introduction to the Design and Application of Intelligent Electronic Systems

description.zh: 本課程以瞭解多媒體通訊及射頻識別的基本工程原理，以及所需應用的人機介面互動設計知識，藉由相關入門的觀念與技術的學習，並結合授課與實作，使學生在設計實務上能有更多的認知。本課程的內容包含數位多媒體影像及通訊基礎、影像增強技術、人機介面設計、射頻識別理論與應用以及互動設計。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the engineering knowledge of multi-media telecommunication and RFID technology, as well as interface design. Students can learn related basic concept and technique, through lecturing and practice work, so as to enhance understanding on this cross-field course. The course contents encompass digital multi-media image and telecommunication, image enhancement technology, interface design, RFID theory and application, and interaction design.

notes: 四電子四四創意四最後一哩合開

description.zh: (1)分波多工系統簡介(2)SBS效應(3)EDFA(光放大器)原理與特性(4)EDFA增益等化(5)DWDM MUX/DeMUX(6)光信號非線性效益(7)類比分波多工系統(8)數位分波多工系統
description.en: (1)Introduction (2)Stimulated Brillouin Scattering (3)EDFA principles (4)EDFA gain flattening (5)DWDM MUX/DeMUX (6)Nonlinear effect (7)analog WDM (8)Digital WDM

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: n
description.en: n

notes: 教師洪彩霞,北大三峽校區社科學院1F13博雅選修自然

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: n
description.en: n

notes: 教師宋惠亮,北大三峽校區商學院3F17_C博雅選修自然

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師辛法春,北大三峽校區文學院2F02博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而?化社會適應能力。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

notes: 教師林昭吟,北大三峽校區社科學院1F01博雅選修社會

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: n
description.en: n

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師賴賢宗,北大三峽校區文學院2F11博雅選修歷史

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師程似錦,北大三峽校區文學院4F09博雅選修文學

Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師賴淑芳,醫大3101教室博雅選修文學

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師蔡篤堅,醫大2305教室博雅選修哲學

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師蔡篤堅,醫大2305教室博雅選修歷史

name.zh: 全球環境危機與永續發展

notes: 教師楊玲玲/沈芯�I,醫大2205教室博雅選修自然

description.zh: 設計心理學旨在於了解設計心理學理論，以及以使用者為中心之設計。課程包含現代心理學基本概念與原則，及人類情緒的互動、認知與感知和產品設計之關係。此外，學生需了解如何將理論實際應用於產品設計上。
description.en: On completion of this course students should have an understanding of design psychology theory and user-centered design. The course includes the basic principles of modern psychology and concepts, interaction of emotion with cognition and perception. In addition, students should be able to understand the theories of these applications in product design.

description.zh:
邀請具備國際設計競賽得獎經驗之業界專家與優秀設計師，分享得獎設計作品的創作起源與設計過程。
邀請設計業界各領域之專家，針對學生在未來就業之職涯規劃與相關工作的技能需求進行分享與介紹。
description.en:
Invite experts and excellent designers who have international design award， sharing creative works and the origin of the design process.
Invite designer and experts to introduce who is company need people in the future.

description.zh:
本課程目標在為本校碩博士班的同學做好英語終身學習的準備。確切學習要點：
1.	建立個人英文資料檔案(含自傳、履歷、求職信件等)。
2.	學習如何運用媒體與英語雜誌及廣播持續不斷地自我提升英文程度。
3.	以活潑的上課方式(唱歌、短劇、演講、講笑話等)培養同學英語溝通表達的能力與膽量。
4.	以閱讀英語學習雜誌培養閱讀能力，並藉由內容的深入討論擴大視野，了解全球現勢與重要議題。
description.en: The aim of this course is to help students (1) sharpen up their learning skills in English language/culture acquisition, (2) prepare a personal dossier (including autobiography, resume, CV and application letters) in English for their future career needs, (3) build up their communication skills through classroom activities, such as singing, reciting passages, short plays, small talks, and speeches.

notes: 一教101教室,限電機及工管系碩博士學生選修(名單內)

name.zh: 智慧電子應用設計概論
name.en: Introduction to the Design and Application of Intelligent Electronic Systems

description.zh: 本課程以瞭解多媒體通訊及射頻識別的基本工程原理，以及所需應用的人機介面互動設計知識，藉由相關入門的觀念與技術的學習，並結合授課與實作，使學生在設計實務上能有更多的認知。本課程的內容包含數位多媒體影像及通訊基礎、影像增強技術、人機介面設計、射頻識別理論與應用以及互動設計。
description.en: This course aims to introduce the engineering knowledge of multi-media telecommunication and RFID technology, as well as interface design. Students can learn related basic concept and technique, through lecturing and practice work, so as to enhance understanding on this cross-field course. The course contents encompass digital multi-media image and telecommunication, image enhancement technology, interface design, RFID theory and application, and interaction design.

notes: 四電子四四創意四最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 本課程承續學生一年級的英文基礎，提供學生更多閱讀機會，並加強閱讀策略指導，以培養學生獨立閱讀、及使用適當英文表達之能力。教材以介紹英語地區文化、思想、及價值觀為主，以協助學生建立世界觀，並培養其批判思考能力。教學活動以團體討論、小組討論、段落與短文習作實施。
description.en: The objective of this course are: (1)to provide the students with abundant reading opportunities based on the students' levels;(2)to introduce various reading strategies to the students so that they may find the optimal strategies to help themselves read independently; and (3)to furnish students with competence in writing. Reading selections will be mainly focused on discussion of the cultures, thoughts and values of the English-speaking world. Students will be able to join activities which encompasses group discussion, small group discussion, paragraph writing and essay writing.

notes: 二年級重補修課程(適用98年度前入學生)

name.zh: 專業證照研訓進階講座
name.en: Advanced professional certification of the institute seminars

description.zh: 為因應近年全球與國內經濟不景氣，各校將更關切社會、經貿與人力市場動態，力圖革新以求招生與就業之競爭力。思考工程產業與商業服務業的科班培育人數，並加強學生專業條件與附加價值，培養敬業積極職業精神與態度，以助其未來職場生存與永續發展。因此，透過本研訓進階講座課程針對國內外商管專業證照實務的研究與探討，以培育學生參加並通過國內與國際商管專業證照考試以及習得第二應用專長為目標，俾培育學生專業能力並提升畢業後之就業競爭力。
description.en: The objectives of this lecture course are to analysis the practices of professional licenses in business and management, nurture students to participate in domestic and international professional certification exams, and acquire the second application of expertise. The targets of this course are to serve students cultivate professional capacity and enhance their employability and competitiveness after graduation.

notes: 上ABC三節課12週四管三最後一哩合開限55人計網314教室

description.zh: 以國內外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students ' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

notes: 家室組(四設二三四合開)
北區教資-台北護理健康大學

name.zh: 電力電子基礎應用電路

description.zh: 窗型空調、箱型空調、中央空調、除濕空調、及各型空調實習、運輸空調實習、各種空調過程實驗及空氣性質點之測定、空調熱回收裝置。
description.en: To familiarize students with practice of room air conditioner, package air conditioner, central air conditioning system, dehumidifying air conditioning system, etc. To provide students with abilities of experiment of air conditioning processes and measurement of air properties.
